description: Have you ever had a cinnamon roll? They are delicious, gooey, and addicting. You can also have them in drink form with the Fireball Cinnamon Roll Shot!This recipe takes the classic flavor of a&nbsp;cinnamon roll using the smoothness and sweetness of Fireball Whiskey. And the addition of cream soda and whipped cream gives the shot that creamy and fizzy touch that will surely satisfy your cravings!
keywords: Fireball Cinnamon Roll Shot Cocktail Recipe
How To Fireball Cinnamon Roll Shot
name: Fireball Cinnamon Roll Shot

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Fireball and cream soda into a shot glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Fireball and cream soda into a shot glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish it with whipped cream and grate the nutmeg on top of the cream.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish it with whipped cream and grate the nutmeg on top of the cream.
